markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Executioner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3561)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Executioners carry out sentences from cruel tyrants and legitimate rulers alike. Most remain numb to the necessity of their duty, but some evil executioners grow to love the power of having someone else's life in their hands.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Executioner.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Executioner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3561)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 116

**Perception** +12

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +13, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[chainmail](/Equipment.aspx?ID=11), _+1 [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=376)_, hood

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +14 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 105

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greataxe_ +16 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d12+9 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+9 bludgeoning

**Behead** <actions string="Three Actions" />  **Requirements** The executioner is adjacent to a [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=69) creature or a creature specifically prepared for a killing blow; **Effect** The executioner Strikes the creature with their greataxe. On a hit, in addition to taking damage, the target must attempt a DC 23 Fortitude save or be reduced to 0 HP and become dying 1. If the creature was already dying (including if it was reduced to 0 HP by the Strike's damage), the creature's dying value increases by 1, in addition to any increase from the Strike. On a critical failure, the creature dies instantly. If the executioner's Strike was a critical hit, the target uses the outcome one degree of success worse than the result of their saving throw.

**Intimidating Strike** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The executioner makes a melee Strike. If it hits and deals damage, the target is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76), or frightened 2 on a critical hit.

**Mark for Death** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The executioner marks a single creature they can see for death. The first time each round the executioner Strikes that creature, the Strike deals an extra 1d12 precision damage. The creature remains marked for death until the executioner is knocked out, marks a different creature for death, or the encounter ends.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-545" />
name: Executioner

text: Executioner Executioners carry out sentences from cruel tyrants and legitimate rulers alike. Most remain numb to the necessity of their duty, but some evil executioners grow to love the power of having someone else's life in their hands. Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 22 Unspecific Lore : DC 20 Specific Lore : DC 17 Executioner Source NPC Core pg. 116 Perception +12 Languages Common Skills Athletics +15, Intimidation +13, Medicine +10 Str +5 Dex +2 Con +3 Int -1 Wis +2 Cha +2 Items chainmail, +1 greataxe , hood --- AC 23 Fort +15 Ref +12 Will +14 HP 105 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action greataxe +16 (Magical, Sweep), Damage 1d12+9 slashing Melee Single Action fist +15 (Agile, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 1d4+9 bludgeoning Behead Three Actions Requirements The executioner is adjacent to a dying creature or a creature specifically prepared for a killing blow; Effect The executioner Strikes the creature with their greataxe. On a hit, in addition to taking damage, the target must attempt a DC 23 Fortitude save or be reduced to 0 HP and become dying 1. If the creature was already dying (including if it was reduced to 0 HP by the Strike's damage), the creature's dying value increases by 1, in addition to any increase from the Strike. On a critical failure, the creature dies instantly. If the executioner's Strike was a critical hit, the target uses the outcome one degree of success worse than the result of their saving throw. Intimidating Strike Two Actions (Emotion, Fear, Mental) The executioner makes a melee Strike. If it hits and deals damage, the target is frightened 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit. Mark for Death Single Action (Concentrate) The executioner marks a single creature they can see for death. The first time each round the executioner Strikes that creature, the Strike deals an extra 1d12 precision damage. The creature remains marked for death until the executioner is knocked out, marks a different creature for death, or the encounter ends.
